name: Zozo - The Sky Hunter
description:
Help Zozo save the earth from an alien attack.

*A mobile game made in two months of 2017 as a college project by me  and two of my college mates.*

*Really Sorry cos the "Exit button is crooked". You'll have to view all the open apps and then close this app from the list given to you at the time. Once again really sorry for this.*
